get.summary: fetchUser
get.description:
Returns the user together with its assignments and settings. If can not fetch its assignments it will set it to 'null'.
In case that CPD account doesn't exist, it will be created as long as there is valid CIAM ID to be tie to. Request parameter locale will be used to fill address country code and preferred language code
__NOTES:__
  • If locale & addressRepresentationType are set, then a formatted address for the user is generated and returned. Both fields need to be set together. If only one field is provided an error is thrown. The formatted address is generated by a backend system. In the case that there is a problem while calling the backend system, no formatted address is returned.
  • The technical security role shows you only the following fields:
    • 'email'
    • 'mobilePhone'
    • 'ciamId'
    • 'userId'
    • 'ucId'
    • 'preferredLanguageCode'
    • 'accountCountryCode'

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Specifies for which locale the address should be formatted

parameters.name: addressRepresentationType
parameters.description: Specifies in which form (LONG or SHORT) the address should be formatted

200.description: the user for the given userId.

403.description: Forbidden

500.description: When following errors occur: * `Internal Server Error

404.description: When following errors occur: * `not_found`User not found.

409.description: When following errors occur: * `already_assigned`Resource could not be modified, because it was concurrently modified.

post.summary: This service provides functionality to initiate a charge optimization configuration.
post.description:
Source: daivb_VVA_zev_v1.3.13.yaml
This service provides functionality to initiate a charge optimization configuration.
JSON Response Example: ```TBD``` * SmartChargeAtDeparture 1 and 2 are viewed as single group, while Weekday and Weekend tariffs as other. Only attributes from single group can be set, in opposite RSI will throw 400 - Bad Request. * For SmartChargeAtDeparture NULL is neutral value, meaning existing data will not be overwritten. * For WeekTariffs there is no neutral value, and existing data will be overwritten. When setting tariffs always set data for both attributes. In case that one tariff attribute stays unset, NULL, Daimler will override it with default value, time = 0 and rate = 33. * When setting WeekTariffs, empty list of tariffs is illegal, so is first tariff in list if doesn't start with time = 0. Any of this violation will produce 400 - Bad Request.

get.description:
List of active services is returned along with data from those services like precond, plug and charge, status, charge-opt, vehicle data, image urls and vehicle flags calculated based on equipment.
Retrieves all services connected to a specific user and a specific vehicle. If the user is subUser only active services will be returned.

swNumber.description: Number (Sachnummer) of the Software installed on a control unit.

appBuildId.description: Unique identifier of an app build, used for referencing specific build on an app. Can be git commit's hash or some other value.

locale.description: Language tag in the form <xx>-<YY>, where <xx> denotes a 2-letter language tag according to ISO 639-1 and <YY> a 2-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

osVersion.description: Version of OS on which app runs on given device

pnCategories.description: List of the warning types at which to register

allUserAgreementConsentsSet.description: Returns true if the state of all consents was set successfully.

doubleValue.description: Data field can return a decimal value.

integerValue.description: Data field can return an integer value.

textValue.description: Data field can return a text value.

consumerCountry.description: The country the vehicle is built for, format: [ISO 3166 ALPHA2]. Valid examples: DE, GB, AE-AZ.

dateOfFirstRegistration.description: Date of first registration of the vehicle.

technicalVehicleInformationTimeStamp.description: Timestamp indicating if and when the technical vehicle data was fetched.

testVehicle.description: True if it is test vehicle.

User.description: Wrapper for CPD user and user's settings for RSI

acceptedLocale.description: Specifies the language of the signed user agreement. Format [ISO 639-1]-[ISO 3166 ALPHA2]. Valid examples: de-DE, zh-CN.

userAgreementAcceptanceStatus.description: The acceptance status of the user agreement for the specific user.

userAgreementId.description: The user agreement ID identifies the specific user agreement for which the status is to be recorded.

userAgreementVersionId.description: The user agreement version that the customer signed or revoked.

acceptedByUser.description: The acceptance status of the user agreement for the specific user.

acceptedLocale.description: Specifies the language of the signed user agreement. Format [ISO 639-1]-[ISO 3166 ALPHA2]. Valid examples: de-DE, zh-CN.

eventobject.description: Container for different types of events

VvrAverageSpeedReset.description: Average speed since reset in km/h (0…405.0)

VvrAverageSpeedStart.description: Average speed since start in km/h (0…405.0)

VvrBatteryCutOffSwitch.description: state of battery cutoff switch    0.. switch is closed,    1.. Pre-Reset warning,    2.. Reset active,    3.. Pre-Open warning,    4.. switch is open,    Range: 0…4

VvrBatteryState.description: Voltage state 12 V battery 0 - green 1 - yellow 2 - red

VvrCertEvseid.description: Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment ID (EVSEID) that unambiguously identifies a charging station.   (corresponds to VVR attribute plugAndChargeContractCertificateUpdateEVSEID)

VvrCertStatus.description: 0 - no contract certificiate available 1 - contract certificate available and not expired 2 - contract certificate available but will expire soon 3 - contract certificate available but expired   (corresponds to VVR attribute plugAndChargeContractCertificateStatus)

VvrCertUpdateStatus.description: false - certificate update failed true - certificate update successful   (corresponds to VVR attribute plugAndChargeContractCertificateUpdateStatus)

VvrChargingPower.description: AC charge current   AC charge voltage   number of phases    current charging Power in kW (only valid while charging)    Range: -102,4..102,2

VvrChargingactive.description: charging active    0: charging inactive   1: charging active    Range: 0..1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrChargingstatus.description: charging error   proximity detection    0.. Vehicle charging   1.. End of Charge   2.. Charge break   3.. Charge cable unplugged   4.. Charging failure    Range: 0…4

VvrDepartureTime2.description: -1              - Value not set   0.. 1439  - Minutes from midnight

VvrDepartureTimeMode.description: departure time mode    0.. Inactive   1.. Adhoc Active   2.. Weeklyset Active    Range: 0..2

VvrDepartureTimeSelection.description: Selected departure time    Bit 0 (LSB)..Departure time 1   Bit 1..Departure time 2   Value interpretation:   0..departure time deactivated   1..departure time activated    Range: 0..3 (bit vector, 2 bits)

VvrDepartureTimeWeekday.description: weeklyset day    0.. Monday   1.. Tuesday   2.. Wednesday   3.. Thursday   4.. Friday   5.. Saturday   6.. Sunday    Range: 0…6

VvrDeparturetime.description: departure time hour   departure time minute   departure time status    0..1439: Departure time counted in minutes from midnight depending on vtime   -1: departure time inactive    Range: -1…1439

VvrDeparturetimesoc.description: SOC at departure time    State of charge at departure time in %.    Range: 0…100

VvrDistanceElectricalReset.description: Distance since reset electrical in km (0…999999.9)

VvrDistanceElectricalStart.description: Distance since start electrical in km (0…999999.9)

VvrDistanceZEReset.description: Distance since Reset Zero Emmision in kilometers (0..2097149)

VvrDistanceZEStart.description: Distance since Start Zero Emmision in kilometers (0..261241)

VvrDoorlockstatusvehicle.description: 0 - Vehicle unlocked 1 - Vehicle internal locked 2 - Vehicle external locked 3 - Vehicle selective unlocked

VvrDrivenTimeReset.description: Driven Time since reset in minutes (0..600000)

VvrDrivenTimeStart.description: Driven Time since start in minutes (0…600000)

VvrDrivenTimeZEReset.description: Driven Time Zero Emission since reset in minutes (0..600000)

VvrDrivenTimeZEStart.description: Driven Time Zero Emission since start in minutes (0..60000)

VvrEcoScoreGearShift.description: ECOscore rating the gear shifting at right moment

VvrElectricalRangeSkipIndication.description: false - display electrical range true - skip electrical range

VvrEndofchargetime.description: full charge hour   full charge minute    0..1439: End of charge time counted in minutes from midnight depending on vtime   -1: end of charge time inactive    Range: -1…1439

VvrEngineHoodStatus.description: false: Engine hood closed true: Engine hood open

VvrFilterParticleLoading.description: 0.. Air quality high 1.. Air quality medium 2.. Air quality low

VvrIgnitionstate.description: 0 - Ignition lock (0) 1 - Ignition off (15c) 2 - Ignition accessory (15r) 4 - Ignition on (15) 5 - Ignition start (50)

VvrLanguageHU.description: 0 = GERMAN 1 = ENGLISH_IMP 2 = FRENCH 3 = ITALIAN 4 = SPANISH 5 = JAPANESE 6 = ENGLISH_MET 7 = DUTCH 8 = DANISH 9 = SWEDISH 10 = TURKISH 11 = PORTUGUESE 12 = RUSSIAN 13 = ARABIC 14 = CHINESE 15 = ENGLISH_AM 16 = TRAD_CHINESE 17 = KOREAN 18 = FINNISH 19 = POLISH 20 = CZECH 21 = PORTUGUESE_BRAZIL 22 = NORWEGIAN 23 = THAI 24 = INDONESIAN 25 = BULGARIAN 26 = SLOVAKIAN 27 = CROATIAN 28 = SERBIAN 29 = HUNGARIAN 30 = UKRAINIAN 31 = MALAYAN 32 = VIETNAMESE 33 = ROMANIAN

VvrLiquidRangeSkipIndication.description: false - display liquid range true - skip liquid range

VvrMaxrange.description: max. electrical range with 100 % soc (without departure time)    alternatively max. range at departure time (set by customer)    Maximum range in km    Range: 0..1500

VvrParkbrakestatus.description: false - "park brake not engaged" true  - "park brake engaged" (all signals that do not signal an engaged park brake will be mapped to "park brake not engaged")

VvrPrecondActive.description: preconditioning 2/3 active    0.. False   1.. True    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondAtDeparture2.description: false - no preconditioning at departure time 2 true - preconditioning at departure time 2

VvrPrecondAtDepartureDisable.description: deactivation precond    Precond disabled because of too many trials triggerd by week profile   0.. Not disabled   1.. Disabled    Range: 0..1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondDuration.description: Duration Preconditioning    Preconditioning now runtime in minutes    Range: 0..254

VvrPrecondError.description: preconditioning error    0.. No request/attribute is changed    1.. PreConditioning not possible, battery low/fuel low(CH2)    2.. PreConditioning available after restart engine    3.. PreConditioning not possible, charging not finished   4.. PreConditioning general error (SmartEdison)    Range: 0…4

VvrPrecondNow.description: Immediate Precond    0.. Inactive   1.. Active    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondNowError.description: Immediate Precond error    0… no request/attribute is changed   1… PreConditioning not possible, battery low/fuel low(CH2)   2.. PreConditioning available after restart engine   3.. PreConditioning not possible, charging not finished    Range: 0..3

VvrPrecondSeatFrontLeft.description: preconditioning seats    0.. False   1.. True    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondSeatFrontRight.description: 0.. False   1.. True    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondSeatRearLeft.description: 0.. False   1.. True    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondSeatRearRight.description: 0.. False   1.. True    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondatdeparture.description: preconditioning 2/3    Preconditioning at departure time    0: inactive   1: active    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrPrecondimmediate.description: preconditioning 1    Immediate preconditioning    0: inactive   1: active    Range: 0…1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrProvisioningID.description: Information about the provisioning certificate that enables to retrieve a contract certificate

VvrRooftopstatus.description: 0 - Unlocked 1 - Open and locked 2 - Closed and locked

VvrSmartCharging.description: Status optimized/intelligent charging    0… Wallbox (Ladesäule) is active   1… Smart Charge Communication is active   2... On/Off-Peak setting is active (Tag-/Nachtstrom)    Range: 0…2

VvrSmartChargingAtDeparture.description: Setting of smart charging option for departure time 1    0..Smart charging inactive for departure time 1   1..Smart charging requested for departure time 1    Range: 0..1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrSmartChargingAtDeparture2.description: Setting of smart charging option for departure time 2    0..Smart charging inactive for departure time 2   1..Smart charging requested for departure time 2    Range: 0..1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrSocprofile.description: SOC charging profile    Array with tupels of state of charge and time offset related to the timestamp of the attribute,   e.g. [{t, soc}, {t, soc}, …, {t, soc}] (every soc with value range 0..100, every timestamp in seconds, UTC)    Range: -

VvrSpeedUnitFromIC.description: false - Vehicle speed unit "km/h" (kilometers per hour) and distance unit "km" (kilometers) true - Vehicle speed unit "mph" (miles per hour) and distance unit "mi" (miles)

VvrSunroofEvent.description: Event Info Rainclose 0 - Kein Event 1 - Dach wegen Regen in Hubstellung gefahren 2 - Dach automatisch in Hubstellung gefahren

VvrSunroofEventActive.description: Event Info Rainclose monitoring active state 0 - not active 1 - active

VvrSunroofstatus.description: 0 - Tilt/slide sunroof is closed 1 - Tilt/slide sunroof is open 2 - Lifting sunroof is open 3 - Tilt/slide sunroof is running 4 - Tilt/slide sunroof in anti-booming position 5 - Sliding sunroof in intermediate position 6 - Lifting sunroof in intermediate position

VvrTcuReceptionMode.description: 0 - TCU does not accept SMS/commands 1 - TCU is in SMS reception mode

VvrTiremarker.description: Bitmask: 0000 0000 No tire is marked 0000 0001 Front left tire is marked 0000 0010 Front right tire is marked 0000 0100 Rear left tire is marked 0000 1000 Rear right tire is marked

VvrTirepressscope.description: 0 - None 1 - Tire burst warning (PRW) 2 - Tire pressure control

VvrTirewarningsrdk.description: 0 - No warning 1 - Soft warning 2 - Low pressure 3 - Deflation

VvrWeeklySetEditingActiveHU.description: Weekly settings editing active    0.. No editing of weeklySet in HU active   1.. Editing of weeklySet in HU active    Range: 0..1    Note: Actual JSON values are false or true, even if description uses 0 or 1.

VvrWeeklySetHU.description: weekly settings from HU    Array with 0 to 21 tupels of day (0..6, 0 = Monday, 1= Tuesday, …) and departuretime in min since midnight (0..1439)   e.g. [{"day": d, "time": t}, {"day": d, "time": t}, … , {"day": d, "time": t}]    Range: -

VvrWindowstatusfrontleft.description: 0: window in intermediate position 1: window completely opened 2: window completely closed

VvrWindowstatusfrontright.description: 0: window in intermediate position 1: window completely opened 2: window completely closed

VvrWindowstatusrearleft.description: 0: window in intermediate position 1: window completely opened 2: window completely closed

VvrWindowstatusrearright.description: 0: window in intermediate position 1: window completely opened 2: window completely closed

WeatherReport.description: Concise version of full weather report from UWeatherApi
